Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: $[if($this.timer) { return "lit"; } else { return "unlit"; }] free-standing trough

A $[if($this.timer) { return "lit"; } else { return "unlit"; }] free-standing trough; it bares a large, circular basin with elaborately curled, wrought iron feet. The rim of the basin depicts a series of dancing runes. Now and then, the form they take almost brings a name to the forefront of your mind, but it always remains out of reach. Large, dangerous talons adorn the feet of the trough, seemingly pressing their claws into the surface beneath. Was that $(this.trait:runes)?
A $[if($this.timer) { return "lit"; } else { return "unlit"; }] free-standing trough; it bares a large, circular basin with elaborately curled, wrought iron feet.
large, circular basin

A large, circular basin makes up the majority of the free-standing trough, holding within it flammable oil. Etched into the rim is a series of dancing runes, they appear to be in constant motion, never maintaining one shape for long. Was that $(this.trait:runes)?
A large, circular basin makes up the majority of the free-standing trough, holding within it flammable oil.
the taloned feet

Four taloned feet perch beneath the large, circular basin, keeping the structure from toppling to and fro. They are attached to the crouching wrought iron legs etched in a masterpiece of tiny, reflective scales. The talons of the feet are sharp and dangerous, appearing as if to grapple at the floor of the room.

the crouching wrought iron legs

The wrought iron legs crouch beneath the weight of the large basin; they end in four taloned feet. Upon closer inspection, you note that the wrought iron itself has been finely etched into a masterpiece of tiny, reflective scales.

the thick black oil

Thick, black oil sits within a large, circular basin; although the surface is flat and serene, it gives of an endlessly burning flame that casts eerie shadows on the smooth and charred walls of the mountain. The source unknown, it bares a reflection through the wreath of fire.

the rim of a large, circular basin

The rim of a large, circular basin bares a series of dancing runes; they are in constant motion. When you think you catch the shape of something familiar it slips straight into another, the names of what you've seen flashing in and out of your memory with seamless ease. You find you cannot recall the images you have witnessed. Was that $(this.trait:runes)?

series of dancing runes

In never-ending motion, the runes dance freely around the lip of the large, circular basin. Staying in one form for but a moment of time, you find you cannot recall any images you have witnessed. They pass in and out of your memories with seamless ease. Was that $(this.trait:runes)?
